name: NBTCompoundHelper
description: The NBTCompoundHelper class is a specialized helper for handling NBT compound tags in JSMacros. It provides a dictionary-like interface for accessing, navigating, and manipulating compound NBT data structures.
overview:
The NBTCompoundHelper class provides:

- Key-based access to NBT values with type information
- Iteration and enumeration of compound keys
- Type checking and conversion for nested values
- Integration with other NBT helper classes
- Safe access methods that handle missing keys gracefully

NBTCompoundHelper instances are typically obtained by:
1. Converting from an existing NBTElementHelper using `asCompoundHelper()`
2. Accessing compound data from items, entities, or other game objects
3. Using the static `wrapCompound()` method

methods.name: wrapCompound
methods.description: Wraps a raw NbtCompound object in an NBTCompoundHelper.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Returns a set of all keys in this compound tag.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the NBT type ID of the value stored at the specified key. (0=END, 1=BYTE, 2=SHORT, 3=INT, 4=LONG, 5=FLOAT, 6=DOUBLE, 7=BYTE_ARRAY, 8=STRING, 9=LIST, 10=COMPOUND, 11=INT_ARRAY, 12=LONG_ARRAY)

methods.name: has
methods.description: Checks if this compound contains a value at the specified key.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the value at the specified key as an NBTElementHelper.

methods.name: asString
methods.description: Retrieves the string representation of the value at the specified key.
